TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ErrObject extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含用于使用 对象标识和处理运行时错误的属性和过程。

span.span: The module contains properties and procedures used to identify and handle run-time errors using the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ErrObject`模块支持`Err`对象。The `ErrObject` module supports the `Err` object. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用的属性`Err`构造错误消息对话框中的对象。This example uses the properties of the `Err` object in constructing an error-message dialog box. 请注意当你使用时，会发生什么情况`Clear`方法第一个： 然后生成使用 Visual Basic 错误`Raise`方法，Visual Basic 的默认值成为的属性`Err`对象。Notice what happens when you use the `Clear` method first: When you then generate a Visual Basic error with the `Raise` method, Visual Basic's default values become the properties of the `Err` object. ```vb Dim Msg As String ' If an error occurs, construct an error message. On Error Resume Next ' Defer error handling. Err.Clear Err.Raise(6) ' Generate an "Overflow" error. ' Check for error, then show message. If Err.Number <> 0 Then Msg = "Error # " & Str(Err.Number) & " was generated by " _ & Err.Source & ControlChars.CrLf & Err.Description MsgBox(Msg, MsgBoxStyle.Information, "Error") End If ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 清除 对象的所有属性设置。

span.span: Clears all property settings of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`Clear`显式清除`Err`对象后已处理错误，例如在使用延迟的错误处理与`On Error Resume Next`。Use `Clear` to explicitly clear the `Err` object after an error has been handled, such as when you use deferred error handling with `On Error Resume Next`. `Clear`自动调用方法每当执行任何以下语句：The `Clear` method is called automatically whenever any of the following statements executes: - 任何一种`Resume`语句Any type of `Resume` statement - `Exit Sub`、`Exit Function` 或 `Exit Property``Exit Sub`, `Exit Function`, or `Exit Property` - 任何`On Error`语句Any `On Error` statement - 任何`Try...Catch...Finally`语句Any `Try...Catch...Finally` statement > [!NOTE] > `On Error Resume Next`构造可能优于`On Error GoTo`时处理期间对其他对象的访问生成的错误。The `On Error Resume Next` construct may be preferable to `On Error GoTo` when handling errors generated during access to other objects. 检查`Err`与对象的每个交互清楚地了解对象所访问的代码之后： 你可以将确定哪些对象放置中的错误代码`Err.Number`，以及哪些对象最初生成错误 （的对象指定在`Err.Source`)。Checking `Err` after each interaction with an object removes ambiguity about which object was accessed by the code: You can be sure which object placed the error code in `Err.Number`, as well as which object originally generated the error (the object specified in `Err.Source`). ## Examples 此示例使用`Err`对象的`Clear`方法来重置的数值属性`Err`零并且其字符串属性设置为零长度字符串的对象。This example uses the `Err` object's `Clear` method to reset the numeric properties of the `Err` object to zero and its string properties to zero-length strings. 而无需调用`Clear`，第二次调用`MsgBox`将显示相同的错误消息。Without the call to `Clear`, the second call to `MsgBox` would display the same error message. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置 表达式，该表达式包含与某个错误关联的描述性字符串。

span.span: Returns or sets a expression containing a descriptive string associated with an error.
Read/write.

value.span: 返回或设置 表达式，该表达式包含与某个错误关联的描述性字符串。

span.span: Returns or sets a expression containing a descriptive string associated with an error.
Read/write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Description`属性设置包括的错误的简短说明。The `Description` property setting consists of a short description of the error. 使用此属性不能或不希望处理的错误向用户发出警报。Use this property to alert the user to an error that you cannot or do not want to handle. 在生成一个用户定义的错误时，将分配到错误的简短说明`Description`属性。When generating a user-defined error, assign a short description of your error to the `Description` property. 如果`Description`属性未填写，和的值属性对应于 Visual Basic 运行时错误，则返回的字符串设置函数`Description`属性时，会生成错误。If the `Description` property is not filled in, and the value of the property corresponds to a Visual Basic run-time error, then the string returned by the function is set in the `Description` property when the error is generated. ## Examples 此示例将分配到用户定义的消息`Description`属性`Err`对象。This example assigns a user-defined message to the `Description` property of the `Err` object. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Erl As Integer
public: property int Erl { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回指示上一条执行语句的行号的整数。

span.span: Returns an integer indicating the line number of the last executed statement.
Read-only.

value.span: 返回指示上一条执行语句的行号的整数。

span.span: Returns an integer indicating the line number of the last executed statement.
Read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Visual Basic 遇到无行号，则返回 0。If Visual Basic encounters no line numbers, it returns 0. ## Examples 此示例使用`Erl`属性以指示的行号。This example uses the `Erl` property to indicate the line number. ``` 10: On Error Resume Next 20: Err.Raise(60000) ' Returns 20. 30: MsgBox(Erl()) ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance class System.Exception GetException() cil managed

summary.span: 返回表示所发生错误的异常。

span.span: Returns the exception representing the error that occurred.

returns.span: 返回表示所发生错误的异常。

span.span: Returns the exception representing the error that occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetException`函数则仅可从`Err`对象类。The `GetException` function is available only from the `Err` object class. 适用于`Exception`属性`Err`对象以显示发生错误。It works with the `Exception` property of the `Err` object to display the error that has occurred. ## Examples 下面的代码显示分配给中的异常的消息`Err`对象：The following code displays the message assigned to the exception in the `Err` object: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#66](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#66)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int HelpContext { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.HelpContext : int with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 ，它包含帮助文件中某个主题的上下文 ID。

span.span: Returns or sets an containing the context ID for a topic in a Help file.
Read/write.

value.span: 返回或设置一个 ，它包含帮助文件中某个主题的上下文 ID。

span.span: Returns or sets an containing the context ID for a topic in a Help file.
Read/write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HelpContext`属性用于显示有关应用程序的上下文相关帮助。The `HelpContext` property is used to display context-sensitive Help for an application. 如果在中指定的帮助文件`HelpFile`、`HelpContext`属性用于自动显示标识的帮助文件。If a Help file is specified in `HelpFile`, the `HelpContext` property is used to automatically display the Help file identified. 如果这两个`HelpFile`和`HelpContext`属性是空的值检查属性。If both the `HelpFile` and `HelpContext` properties are empty, the value of the property is checked. 如果值`Number`属性对应于 Visual Basic 运行时错误值，则使用错误的 Visual Basic 帮助上下文 ID。If the value of the `Number` property corresponds to a Visual Basic run-time error value, then the Visual Basic Help context ID for the error is used. 如果值`Number`属性不对应于 Visual Basic 错误，将显示 Visual Basic 帮助文件的内容屏幕。If the value of the `Number` property does not correspond to a Visual Basic error, the contents screen for the Visual Basic Help file is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中处理典型错误，应编写的例程。You should write routines in your application to handle typical errors. 编程时对一个对象，你可以使用对象的帮助文件，以改善质量的错误处理，或向用户显示有意义的消息，如果错误是不可恢复。When programming with an object, you can use the object's Help file to improve the quality of your error handling, or to display a meaningful message to your user if the error is not recoverable. ## Examples 此示例使用`HelpContext`属性`Err`对象以显示有关的 Visual Basic 帮助主题`Overflow`错误。This example uses the `HelpContext` property of the `Err` object to show the Visual Basic Help topic for the `Overflow` error. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HelpFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HelpFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 表达式，该表达式包含帮助文件的完全限定路径。

span.span: Returns or sets a expression containing the fully qualified path to a Help file.
Read/write.

value.span: 返回或设置一个 表达式，该表达式包含帮助文件的完全限定路径。

span.span: Returns or sets a expression containing the fully qualified path to a Help file.
Read/write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的帮助文件`HelpFile`属性，它将自动调用当用户按下的帮助按钮 （或 F1 键） 在错误消息对话框中。If a Help file is specified by the `HelpFile` property, it is automatically called when the user presses the Help key (or the F1 key) in the error message dialog box. 如果`HelpContext`属性包含有效的上下文自动显示指定的文件，该主题的 ID。If the `HelpContext` property contains a valid context ID for the specified file, that topic is automatically displayed. 如果没有`HelpFile`指定，则会显示 Visual Basic 帮助文件。If no `HelpFile` is specified, the Visual Basic Help file is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序中处理典型错误，应编写的例程。You should write routines in your application to handle typical errors. 编程时对一个对象，你可以使用对象的帮助文件，以改善质量的错误处理，或向用户显示有意义的消息，如果错误是不可恢复。When programming with an object, you can use the object's Help file to improve the quality of your error handling, or to display a meaningful message to your user if the error is not recoverable. ## Examples 此示例使用`HelpFile`属性`Err`对象以启动帮助系统。This example uses the `HelpFile` property of the `Err` object to start the Help system. 默认情况下，`HelpFile`属性包含 Visual Basic 帮助文件的名称。By default, the `HelpFile` property contains the name of the Visual Basic Help file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastDllError As Integer
public: property int LastDllError { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回调用动态链接库 (DLL) 所产生的系统错误代码。

span.span: Returns a system error code produced by a call to a dynamic-link library (DLL).
Read-only.

value.span: 返回调用动态链接库 (DLL) 所产生的系统错误代码。

span.span: Returns a system error code produced by a call to a dynamic-link library (DLL).
Read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅适用于从 Visual Basic 代码中进行的 DLL 调用。The property applies only to DLL calls made from Visual Basic code. 发出此类调用后，所调用的函数通常返回代码，指示成功或失败，和填充属性。When such a call is made, the called function usually returns a code indicating success or failure, and the property is filled. 请检查 DLL 的函数来确定指示成功或失败的返回值的文档。Check the documentation for the DLL's functions to determine the return values that indicate success or failure. 只要返回失败代码，Visual Basic 应用程序应立即检查属性。Whenever the failure code is returned, the Visual Basic application should immediately check the property. 不会引发异常时属性设置。No exception is raised when the property is set. > [!NOTE] > 属性受，这有助于阻止它访问不受信任代码。The property is protected by , which helps prevent it from being accessed from untrusted code. 但是，需要仅直接调用方具有权限。However, requires only the immediate caller to have permission. 如果可以从部分受信任代码调用你的代码，公开的值没有验证会带来安全风险。If your code can be called from partially trusted code, exposing the value of without validation is a security risk. > > 有关如何使用有关的重要限制成员，请参阅[Demand vs。LinkDemand](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5)。For important limitations about how to use the member, see [Demand vs. LinkDemand](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5). 有关权限的详细信息，请参阅和[代码访问权限](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information about permissions, see and [Code Access Permissions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). 注意对于智能设备此属性始终返回零。Note For smart devices this property always returns zero. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`LastDllError`后调用 Windows API 中的函数的属性。The following example shows how you can use the `LastDllError` property after calling a function in the Windows API. `PrintWindowCoordinates`过程到一个窗口，并调用采用句柄`GetWindowRect`函数。The `PrintWindowCoordinates` procedure takes a handle to a window and calls the `GetWindowRect` function. `GetWindowRect` 用窗口组成的矩形的边的长度填充 RECT 数据结构。`GetWindowRect` fills the RECT data structure with the lengths of the sides of the rectangle that make up the window. 如果您传入无效句柄，出现错误，并且错误号是可通过`LastDllError`属性。If you pass an invalid handle, an error occurs, and the error number is available through the `LastDllError` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#8)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#9)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#10)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Number { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Number : int with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置指定错误的数值。

span.span: Returns or sets a numeric value specifying an error.
Read/write.

value.span: 返回或设置指定错误的数值。

span.span: Returns or sets a numeric value specifying an error.
Read/write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有`Raise`除外的自变量`Number`都是可选的。All of the `Raise` arguments except `Number` are optional. 如果省略可选参数，且的属性设置`Err`对象包含尚未清除的值，这些值将用作您的错误的值。If you omit optional arguments, and the property settings of the `Err` object contain values that have not been cleared, those values serve as the values for your error. 因为`Err`对象提供更加丰富的信息比时生成错误`Error`语句，`Raise`可用于编写类模块时生成错误。Because the `Err` object gives richer information than when you generate errors with the `Error` statement, `Raise` is useful for generating errors when writing class modules. 例如，对于`Raise`方法，可以在指定生成错误的源`Source`属性，该错误的联机帮助可以引用，依次类推。For example, with the `Raise` method, the source that generated the error can be specified in the `Source` property, online Help for the error can be referenced, and so on. 当从一个对象返回一个用户定义的错误，设置`Err.Number`通过添加数你选为错误代码为`VbObjectError`常量。When returning a user-defined error from an object, set `Err.Number` by adding the number you selected as an error code to the `VbObjectError` constant. 例如，你可以使用下面的代码返回数字 1051年作为错误代码：For example, you use the following code to return the number 1051 as an error code: [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#13)] ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用典型的`Number`在错误处理例程中的属性。This example illustrates a typical use of the `Number` property in an error-handling routine. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#12)] 此示例使用`Err`对象的`Raise`方法来生成原始错误在 Visual Basic 中编写的函数。This example uses the `Err` object's `Raise` method to generate an original error within a function written in Visual Basic. 调用的函数可以捕获错误并报告给用户。The calling function can catch the error and report it to the user. 请注意该过程`CallingProcedure`形成了鲜明对比的信息，你可以从派生类型`Err`可以派生自的信息的对象`Exception`对象。Notice that procedure `CallingProcedure` contrasts the type of information that you can derive from an `Err` object with the information that you can derive from an `Exception` object. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#14)]

span.span: is greater than 65535.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Raise (int Number, object Source = null, object Description = null, object HelpFile = null, object HelpContext = null);
.method public instance void Raise(int32 Number, object Source, object Description, object HelpFile, object HelpContext) cil managed
Public Sub Raise (Number As Integer, Optional Source As Object = null, Optional Description As Object = null, Optional HelpFile As Object = null, Optional HelpContext As Object = null)
member this.Raise : int * obj * obj * obj * obj -> unit

param.name: Number
param.span: 必须的。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 标识错误本质的 整数。

span.span: integer that identifies the nature of the error.

param.span: Visual Basic 错误处于 0 到 65535 的范围内：范围 0 到 512 保留用于系统错误，范围 513 到 65535 则用于用户定义的错误。

span.span: Visual Basic errors are in the range 0–65535; the range 0–512 is reserved for system errors; the range 513–65535 is available for user-defined errors.

param.span: 当在类模块中将 属性设置为您自己的错误代码时，将错误代码号添加到 常数。

span.span: When setting the property to your own error code in a class module, you add your error code number to the constant.

param.span: 例如，将 vbObjectError + 513 分配给 属性，生成错误号 513。

span.span: For example, to generate the error number 513, assign vbObjectError + 513 to the property.

param.name: Source
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 表达式，用于命名生成错误的对象或应用程序。

span.span: expression naming the object or application that generated the error.

param.span: 设置对象的这一属性时，应使用如下形式：project.class。

span.span: When setting this property for an object, use the form project.class.

param.span: 如果未指定 Source，则使用当前 Visual Basic 项目的进程 ID。

span.span: If Source is not specified, the process ID of the current Visual Basic project is used.

param.name: Description
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 描述错误的 表达式。

span.span: expression describing the error.

param.span: 如果未指定，则检查 属性值。

span.span: If unspecified, the value in the property is examined.

param.span: 如果它可以映射到 Visual Basic 运行时错误代码，则将 函数要返回的字符串用作 属性。

span.span: If it can be mapped to a Visual Basic run-time error code, the string that would be returned by the function is used as the property.

param.span: 如果没有对应于 属性的 Visual Basic 错误，则使用"应用程序定义的错误或对象定义的错误"消息。

span.span: If there is no Visual Basic error corresponding to the property, the "Application-defined or object-defined error" message is used.

param.name: HelpFile
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 帮助文件的完全限定路径，在该文件中可找到有关此错误的帮助信息。

span.span: The fully qualified path to the Help file in which help on this error can be found.

param.span: 如果未指定该参数，则 Visual Basic 使用 Visual Basic 帮助文件的完全限定的驱动器、路径和文件名。

span.span: If unspecified, Visual Basic uses the fully qualified drive, path, and file name of the Visual Basic Help file.

param.name: HelpContext
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 上下文 ID，用于标识提供错误帮助的 HelpFile 中的主题。

span.span: The context ID identifying a topic within HelpFile that provides help for the error.

param.span: 如果省略该参数，则使用与 属性对应的错误的 Visual Basic 帮助文件上下文 ID（如果存在）。

span.span: If omitted, the Visual Basic Help-file context ID for the error corresponding to the property is used, if it exists.

summary.span: 生成一个运行时错误；可以替代 语句使用。

span.span: Generates a run-time error; can be used instead of the statement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有`Raise`除外的自变量`Number`都是可选的。All of the `Raise` arguments except `Number` are optional. 如果省略可选参数，且的属性设置`Err`对象包含尚未清除的值，这些值将用作您的错误的值。If you omit optional arguments, and the property settings of the `Err` object contain values that have not been cleared, those values serve as the values for your error. 因为`Err`对象提供更加丰富的信息比时生成错误`Error`语句，`Raise`可用于编写类模块时生成错误。Because the `Err` object gives richer information than when you generate errors with the `Error` statement, `Raise` is useful for generating errors when writing class modules. 例如，对于`Raise`方法，可以在指定生成错误的源`Source`属性，该错误的联机帮助可以引用，依次类推。For example, with the `Raise` method, the source that generated the error can be specified in the `Source` property, online Help for the error can be referenced, and so on. ## Examples 此示例使用`Err`对象的`Raise`方法来生成在 Visual Basic 中编写的函数中出错。This example uses the `Err` object's `Raise` method to generate an error within a function written in Visual Basic. 调用的函数可以捕获错误并将其报告给用户提供一个消息框。The calling function can catch the error and report it to the user with a message box. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#14)]

span.span: Returns or sets a expression specifying the name of the object or application that originally generated the error.
Read/write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Source`属性指定`String`表达式表示的对象生成了错误; 表达式通常是对象的类名称或进程 id。The `Source` property specifies a `String` expression representing the object that generated the error; the expression is usually the object's class name or process ID. 使用`Source`属性无法处理的访问的对象生成的错误代码时提供信息。Use the `Source` property to provide information when your code is unable to handle an error generated in an accessed object. 例如，如果你访问 Microsoft Excel 并生成`Division by zero`错误，Microsoft Excel 设置`Err.Number`到有关该错误并设置其错误代码`Source`到"Excel.Application"。For example, if you access Microsoft Excel and it generates a `Division by zero` error, Microsoft Excel sets `Err.Number` to its error code for that error and sets `Source` to "Excel.Application". 应用程序从代码中，生成错误时`Source`是应用程序的编程 id。When the application is generating an error from code, `Source` is your application's programmatic ID. 在类中，`Source`应包含具有窗体名称*项目*。*类*。Within a class, `Source` should contain a name having the form *project*.*class*. 在代码中，发生意外的错误时`Source`属性自动填写。When an unexpected error occurs in your code, the `Source` property is automatically filled in. 有关模块中存在错误`Source`包含项目名称。For errors in a module, `Source` contains the project name. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`Source`典型的错误处理例程中的属性。This example demonstrates the use of the `Source` property in a typical error-handling routine. 当从引发错误`Class1`，字符串`"Class1"`分配给`Source`属性`Err`对象。When an error is raised from `Class1`, the string `"Class1"` is assigned to the `Source` property of the `Err` object. 然后，此字符串将显示在一信息性消息，指明的源和的错误号。This string is then displayed in an informative message indicating the source and number of the error. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#15)]
